titleStmt.title: Seasonable advice to all Protestants in Europe of what persuasion soever, for uniting and defending themselves against popish tyranny written in French by ... Peter Jurieu ; done out of French.
titleStmt.author: Jurieu, Pierre, 1637-1713.

notesStmt.note: Translation into English of an unidentified work in French.
Reproduction of original in Bristol Public Library, Bristol, England
